backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing authenticated document storage with add, remove, get, and filter operations using blob references.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing high-level summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme variables and dark mode styles using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the root React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup wrapping routes in authentication and app shell providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication gate showing a login card with logo until Internet Identity is available.
frontend/src/components/documents/Docume: Document action menu providing view, download, and delete operations with confirmation dialog.
UI component providing category, office, direction, date range, and text filters for documents, with logic to reset and validate selections.
Displays a table of documents with metadata, direction icons, and navigation to detail pages, including load-more support.
frontend/src/components/documents/EmptyS: Shows an empty state illustration and button to upload a document when no documents exist.
Application layout with header, navigation, theme toggle, and user account menu wrapping page content.
frontend/src/features/documents/useDelet: React Query mutation hook for deleting a document and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/features/documents/useDocum: Fetches a single document by ID using React Query and the backend actor.
Fetches filtered documents from backend, applies client-side search and sorting, and manages incremental pagination.
frontend/src/features/documents/useUploa: Handles uploading a document, converting file data to base64, creating metadata, and invalidating queries post-upload.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state, login, and logout. Includes helpers to create an AuthClient and expose status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes, plus utility classes like line clamping.
frontend/src/lib/categoryHelpers.ts: Maps Category enum values to display labels and provides a list of category option objects.
frontend/src/lib/officeHelpers.ts: Converts Office enum variants to humanâ€‘readable labels and maps string IDs to Office objects. Also includes helpers for nursing and generic offices.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a cn function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for merging class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentDetailPage.ts: Displays detailed information for a single document, including preview, metadata, and actions. Handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentListPage.tsx: Shows a filterable, paginated list of documents with loading and error handling. Integrates DocumentFilters and DocumentList components.
frontend/src/pages/UploadDocumentPage.ts: Form page for uploading documents with validation, progress tracking, and success state handling. Supports selecting category, office, direction, and metadata.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state describing requirements to replace login/sign-in images with a user-uploaded photo, including existing features, issues, and metadata.
